en.title: How to Choose and Give Cat Treats: Proper Portions and Frequency
en.content:
Treats are a great tool for bonding with your cat and offering rewards, but improper use can lead to obesity and picky eating.

Proper Treat Portions

Treats should be kept within 10% of your cat's total daily calorie intake. A 4 kg cat needs roughly 250-280 kcal per day, so treats should be limited to about 25-28 kcal.

Types of Treats and How to Choose

Paste-type treats (such as Churu) are highly palatable and also useful for administering medication. Freeze-dried meat has fewer additives and is a safe choice. Dental care treats also help maintain dental health. Choose products with simple ingredient lists.

Important Notes

Giving too many treats can cause your cat to refuse their regular food. Treats should only serve as a supplement; the foundation of nutrition should come from a complete and balanced cat food.

zh.title: 猫咪零食的选择与喂食方法：适当的量和频率
zh.content:
零食是与猫咪沟通和奖励的好工具，但喂食方式不当可能导致肥胖和挑食。

零食的适当用量

零食应控制在每日总热量的10%以内。4公斤的猫每日所需热量约250~280千卡，因此零食应控制在25~28千卡以内。

零食的种类与选择方法

膏状零食（如啾噜）口感好，喂药时也很方便。冻干肉类添加剂少，比较安心。洁牙零食还有助于维护牙齿健康。请选择配料表简单的产品。

注意事项

零食喂太多可能导致猫咪不吃主食。零食终究只是辅助，营养的基础应该靠全价猫粮来保障。
